text: <a href="../2-Thessalonians-3-1/" title="2 Thessalonians 3:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 Finally, brethren, pray for us, that the word of the Lord may have *free* course, and be glorified, even as *it is* with you:

<a href="../2-Thessalonians-3-2/" title="2 Thessalonians 3:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 And that we may be delivered from unreasonable and wicked men: for all *men* have not faith.
<a href="../2-Thessalonians-3-3/" title="2 Thessalonians 3:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 But the Lord is faithful, who shall stablish you, and keep *you* from evil.

<a href="../2-Thessalonians-3-4/" title="2 Thessalonians 3:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 And we have confidence in the Lord touching you, that ye both do and will do the things which we command you.

<a href="../2-Thessalonians-3-5/" title="2 Thessalonians 3:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 And the Lord direct your hearts into the love of God, and into the patient waiting for Christ.

<a href="../2-Thessalonians-3-6/" title="2 Thessalonians 3:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 Now we command you, brethren, in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, that ye withdraw yourselves from every brother that walketh disorderly, and not after the tradition which he received of us.

<a href="../2-Thessalonians-3-7/" title="2 Thessalonians 3:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 For yourselves know how ye ought to follow us: for we behaved not ourselves disorderly among you;

<a href="../2-Thessalonians-3-8/" title="2 Thessalonians 3:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 Neither did we eat any man's bread for nought; but wrought with labour and travail night and day, that we might not be chargeable to any of you:

<a href="../2-Thessalonians-3-9/" title="2 Thessalonians 3:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 Not because we have not power, but to make ourselves an ensample unto you to follow us.

<a href="../2-Thessalonians-3-10/" title="2 Thessalonians 3:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 For even when we were with you, this we commanded you, that if any would not work, neither should he eat.

<a href="../2-Thessalonians-3-11/" title="2 Thessalonians 3:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 For we hear that there are some which walk among you disorderly, working not at all, but are busybodies.

<a href="../2-Thessalonians-3-12/" title="2 Thessalonians 3:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 Now them that are such we command and exhort by our Lord Jesus Christ, that with quietness they work, and eat their own bread.
<a href="../2-Thessalonians-3-13/" title="2 Thessalonians 3:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 But ye, brethren, be not weary in well doing.

<a href="../2-Thessalonians-3-14/" title="2 Thessalonians 3:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 And if any man obey not our word by this epistle, note that man, and have no company with him, that he may be ashamed.
<a href="../2-Thessalonians-3-15/" title="2 Thessalonians 3:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 Yet count *him* not as an enemy, but admonish *him* as a brother.

<a href="../2-Thessalonians-3-16/" title="2 Thessalonians 3:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16 Now the Lord of peace himself give you peace always by all means. The Lord *be* with you all.

<a href="../2-Thessalonians-3-17/" title="2 Thessalonians 3:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17 The salutation of Paul with mine own hand, which is the token in every epistle: so I write.

<a href="../2-Thessalonians-3-18/" title="2 Thessalonians 3:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18 The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ *be* with you all. Amen. (*The second *epistle* to the Thessalonians was written from Athens.*)
